articles.author: L'EQUIPE
articles.title: Le Mexique tente de faire taire les cris homophobes dans ses stades
articles.description: Condamnée à de nombreuses amendes par la FIFA, sanctionnée de huis clos, la Fédération mexicaine de football a pris des mesures pour tenter d'en finir avec un cri jugé homophobe qui vise notamment les gardiens adverses.
articles.content: « Eeeeh, putoooo ! » (« eh la pute ! ») ... Ce cri jugé homophobe visant notamment les gardiens adverses lors de leurs dégagements a déjà valu à la Fédération mexicaine de football (FMF) plusieurs sa… [+2367 chars]

articles.title: Matildas' Asian Cup exit is the moment of reckoning Australian football has been waiting for
articles.description: History shows us that the Matildas have struggled at major international tournaments, so why does their Asian Cup exit feel so different?
articles.content:

articles.title: Deandre Moore Jr, top WR in 2023 class, decommits from Oklahoma football program
articles.description: Deandre Moore Jr., the No. 11 prospect in the 2023 class and the top wide receiver has decommitted from Oklahoma. USC and Louisville are expected to be in play for the California native.
articles.content:
Wide receiver Deandre Moore Jr. decommitted from Oklahoma on Monday. Moore is the No. 11 prospect in the 2023 class and was the highest ranked commitment in the Sooners class.
